resources.string:
Invento 2K18 is a momentous Technical Fest conducted in KLE Dr.M.S Sheshgiri College of Engineering and Technology to enocurage budding Engineers and Managers Of Future.It is hosted every year.
 	 Invento signifies ability to be creative and imbibe Thoughtfulness hunger to concot.It is a platform to unleash the Potential of the students from all disciplines.The Aim of this event is to elucidate the major engineering and business activities through the different events thus to elicit the diverse response from the rapt and admiringly students.Undoubtly this event is a beacon of light for all those who balance and blend their skills with palatable and Innovative ideas accompnied with verve.
 	 	 A melting point of activities and events topped Cultural and Entertainment.A mega annual technical fest with over 40+ events,from 11 departments conducted for 3 days,with more than 20 stalls to tickle your taste buds and with an expected participation of 4000+ students and staff with prizes of Rs.4 lakh to be won .
 Come be a part of Magnanimous Event
